mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yuangong_id as yuangongId ,a.qingjia_uuid_number as qingjiaUuidNumber ,a.qingjia_name as qingjiaName ,a.qingjia_kaishi_time as qingjiaKaishiTime ,a.qingjia_jieshu_time as qingjiaJieshuTime ,a.qingjia_types as qingjiaTypes ,a.qingjia_content as qingjiaContent ,a.qingjia_yesno_types as qingjiaYesnoTypes ,a.qingjia_yesno_text as qingjiaYesnoText ,a.qingjia_shenhe_time as qingjiaShenheTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yuangong.yuangong_uuid_number as yuangongUuidNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_name as yuangongName ,yuangong.yuangong_phone as yuangongPhone ,yuangong.yuangong_id_number as yuangongIdNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_photo as yuangongPhoto ,yuangong.bumen_types as bumenTypes ,yuangong.zhiwei_types as zhiweiTypes ,yuangong.yuangong_email as yuangongEmail
FROM qingjia a left JOIN yuangong yuangong ON a.yuangong_id = yuangong.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yuangong_id = #{params.yuangongId} )
and a.qingjia_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.qingjiaUuidNumber},'%')
and a.qingjia_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.qingjiaName},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_kaishi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaKaishiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_kaishi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaKaishiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_jieshu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaJieshuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_jieshu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaJieshuTimeEnd})
and a.qingjia_types = #{params.qingjiaTypes}
and a.qingjia_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.qingjiaContent},'%')
and a.qingjia_yesno_types = #{params.qingjiaYesnoTypes}
and a.qingjia_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.qingjiaYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_shenhe_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaShenheTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_shenhe_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaShenheTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yuangong_id IS NOT NULL
and yuangong.yuangong_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongUuidNumber},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongName},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongPhone},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongIdNumber},'%')
and yuangong.bumen_types = #{params.bumenTypes}
and yuangong.zhiwei_types = #{params.zhiweiTypes}
and yuangong.yuangong_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
